articles.title: YouTube Music Gets Library Transfer Feature as Google Preps for the Death of Google Play Music - Gizmodo
articles.description: YouTube Music was supposed to be the successor to Google Play Music, when it launched in 2018, but it lacked a number of core features, including the ability to transfer your music library over from Google’s previous music streaming app. Now, ahead of Google …

articles.title: Hennessey Pits Corvette C8 Against Shelby GT500 In Drag Race - Motor1
articles.description: They’re both stock.
articles.content: The 2020 Chevy Corvette C8 and the 2020 Ford Mustang Shelby GT500 are two potent American sports cars. Well watch videos all day long of the two duking it out at the drag strip or on the race track. The latest drag race video comes from Hennessey Performance,… [+1817 chars]

articles.author: Sean Carey
articles.title: The Culling is coming back, but with possibly the most punishing monetisation model ever - TrueAchievements
articles.description: The Culling is getting released again on the Xbox One. This time, the game includes better graphics, better AI and a shockingly bad monetisation system that only allows you to play online once per day.
articles.content: The battle royale title, The Culling, is once again returning to Xbox One, this time with several changes, including better graphics, better AI and possibly one of the most punishing monetisation models ever seen. The Culling: Origins will cost $5.99, however… [+1856 chars]

articles.author: Chaim Gartenberg
articles.title: The Alienware Area-51m’s upgradable dream has failed in just one year - Circuit Breaker
articles.description: Alienware has announced a new hardware refresh for its Area-51m gaming laptop. But the new CPU and GPU parts won’t be available for the first-gen model, which promised future-proof user-upgradable parts as a key selling point.
articles.content:
Filed under:
Original owners wont get any of the new CPU or GPU upgrades
Alienware has announced the second generation of its flagship Area-51m gaming laptop, the Area-51m R2. Its largely similar on the outside to the original Area-51m, but the specs are al… [+3842 chars]
